events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-09 involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and classified under the Auto Accident cluster based on the reported collision and damage details.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their vehicle accident claim.
The customer received acknowledgment that their accident claim has been registered in the system successfully.
The insurance company requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's license for verification.
The customer submitted all requested documentation including pictures of damages and the official police report promptly.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and accident details to assess liability and damage extent.
The investigation concluded confirming fault and estimating repair costs for the vehicle damages sustained.
A settlement offer was communicated to the customer covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses during repairs.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process and the settlement terms proposed by the insurer.
The insurance company approved the claim based on completed investigations and agreed settlement figures.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as reimbursement for vehicle repairs.
Following payment, the claim was officially closed in the system and the customer was notified of the closure.
All claim files and documents were archived securely for record keeping and potential future reference.
